about.title: About Me.
about.subtitle: dedicated to building scalable, high-performance web applications.
about.paragraph1: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with experience in building web applications using modern technologies.
about.paragraph2: My journey in web development started with a curiosity for how things work on the internet, which led me to learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fast forward to today, I have had the privilege of working on various projects, from simple landing pages to complex web applications.
